data.eml:eml: Description of the mature larva of Gastrophysa janthina (Suffrian, 1851) [= G. unicolor auct.] (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Chrysomelinae) and key to the larvae of the European Gastrophysa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baselga, Andrés (2007): Description of the mature larva of Gastrophysa janthina (Suffrian, 1851) [= G. unicolor auct.] (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Chrysomelinae) and key to the larvae of the European Gastrophysa. Zootaxa 1594: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178650
